Open Source LLMs
### Large Language Models, LLMs ###

OpenAI GPT-2
https://openai.com/research/gpt-2-1-5b-release
https://github.com/openai/gpt-2
https://huggingface.co/gpt2
https://transformer.huggingface.co/doc/gpt2-large
https://towardsdatascience.com/language-models-gpt-and-gpt-2-8bdb9867c50a
https://timhanewich.medium.com/running-openais-gpt-2-language-model-on-your-pc-5d5e1b9fbb8b


### Open Source Alternatives ###
EleutherAI GPT-NEOX-20B
https://blog.eleuther.ai/announcing-20b/
https://github.com/EleutherAI/gpt-neox
https://huggingface.co/EleutherAI/gpt-neox-20b


EleutherAI GPT-J-6B
https://arankomatsuzaki.wordpress.com/2021/06/04/gpt-j/
https://huggingface.co/EleutherAI/gpt-j-6B


Stanford University Alpaca
https://crfm.stanford.edu/2023/03/13/alpaca.html
https://github.com/tatsu-lab/stanford_alpaca
https://huggingface.co/datasets/tatsu-lab/alpaca
https://huggingface.co/chavinlo/alpaca-native


Tsinghua University ChatGLM-6B
https://github.com/THUDM/ChatGLM-6B
https://huggingface.co/THUDM/chatglm-6b
https://chatglm.cn/blog


ColossalAI  ColossalChat
https://chat.colossalai.org/
https://github.com/hpcaitech/ColossalAI/tree/main/applications/Chat
https://github.com/hpcaitech/ColossalAI
https://medium.com/@yangyou_berkeley/colossalchat-an-open-source-solution-for-cloning-chatgpt-with-a-complete-rlhf-pipeline-5edf08fb538b


Cerebras Cerebras-GPT-13B
https://huggingface.co/cerebras/Cerebras-GPT-13B
https://www.cerebras.net/blog/cerebras-gpt-a-family-of-open-compute-efficient-large-language-models/


Nomic AI GPT4All
https://github.com/nomic-ai/gpt4all
https://huggingface.co/nomic-ai/gpt4all-lora


Chinese-alpaca-lora
https://github.com/LC1332/Chinese-alpaca-lora
https://huggingface.co/qychen/luotuo-lora-7b-0.1


alpaca-lora
https://github.com/tloen/alpaca-lora


Lianjia BELLE
https://github.com/LianjiaTech/BELLE
https://huggingface.co/BelleGroup


togethercomputer/OpenChatKit
https://www.together.xyz/blog/openchatkit
https://github.com/togethercomputer/OpenChatKit
https://huggingface.co/spaces/togethercomputer/OpenChatKit

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
### Reference ###

https://github.com/huggingface/transformers

Fine-tune a pretrained model
https://huggingface.co/docs/transformers/main/en/training

LoRA: Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models
https://github.com/microsoft/LoRA

Using LoRA for Efficient Stable Diffusion Fine-Tuning
https://huggingface.co/blog/lora
